1511551884_1PqPgJRxQNDQcWu57czCohVq92DkN.body: LOL..Try hiding in a car and drive to Hong Kong. The land borders are not that strict.

1513170471_1PyrAjbZiHyfW7jSWeUpDPSeMU7sA.body: p2p is inherently not suitable for tasks such as translation.  If I can remember correctly, it took terabytes of data to train google translate to its accuracy today (actual size could be wrong, bottom line is that our casual home PCs won't be able to handle that much of data). The best solution here is to use translation apis within zites.
